items.desc:
Who we are?

Youngandenergetic (YNE) is a product of Pentagrit, a discovery research company with focus across major therapeutic areas such as tumour, metabolism, neurology and infection. We possess the skills and knowhow of disease initiation, progression and healing.

What we do?

YNE focuses on using vegetable/fruit nutrients to recover and regenerate the body through the body's own recovery pathways.

What we offer?

YNE offers personalized nutrients that can repair and regenerate the body.

How do we do it?

YNE uses cellular response test to identify the required nutrients for each individual. The personalized nutrients are formulated and provided as a daily recommended dosage.

What is the science behind personalised nutrients?

YNE uses the state of art methods to identify personalized nutrients and bring the below four broad changes in you step by step.
Step 1 Digestion and Sleep - Nutrients that can improve metabolism are identified that eliminate waste from the body and harmonize daily cycles.
Step 2 Strength, Stamina and Mood - Nutrient that act on muscle, bones and nervous system towards aid in targeted rebuild are identified.
Step 3 For hormonal balance and to regulate immunity - Nutrients that balance endocrine cycles are identified.
Step 4 Anti-Aging and Beauty - Nutrients that build overall regeneration and repair of the body leading to complete regeneration are identified

How our product works

  • Cancer
    Build Immunity to fight Tumor Cells
  • Diabetes
    Promotes Regenerative of Islets
  • Hives/Urticaria
    Balances Immune Response
  • Fat Loss
    Eliminates Excess Fat through increased BMR
  • Insomnia
    Resets Circadian Rhythm and regularizes pulmonary function
  • Gastro Intestinal Disorders
    Increases Digestion Capacity
  • Anti-Aging
    Eliminate cellulites and promotes regeneration
  • General Wellness
    Stabilizes hormones and aids in physical activity
  • Health & Fitness
    Detoxification and Body Toner
  • Enhancing Stamina
    Promotes Muscle Endurance
  • Anti-Fatigue
    Increases energy availability
  • Bone Health
    Promotes Bone Remineralization
  • Geriatrics
    Supports regeneration and energy balance
  • PCOS
    Balances Hormones and Regularizes Cycle
  • Skin Care
    Improves Collagen building Capacity & resistance to toxins

Everyone can stay healthy

Our Process

Meet us for a consultation
Make an appointment

Take a live personalized test

Receive a personalized vegetable derived nutrients for 31 days

If you feel better, order online for another month. There are no forced subscription packages.
